image.name: inputVolume
image.label: Input DWI Image Volume
image.description: The DWI Image to apply Compressed Sensing to.

image.name: outputVolume
image.label: Output Image Volume
image.description: Filename for modified DWI Image Volume

image.name: maskVolume
image.label: Input Mask Volume
image.description: Optional binary image to use as mask

file.name: replacementGradients
file.label: Replacement Gradients
file.description: Gradients to use instead of those embedded in the input volume
